CustomField.description: This is an organization that works with, represents, and/or indirectly benefits impacted communities and diverse groups.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: An organization that works with, represents, and/or indirectly benefits communities of color, low-income/low-wealth and/or marginalized communities/disproportionately affected populations impacted by pollution, climate change or other environmental hazards.
CustomField.label: Social and EJ Organization
